name: aashas
description: Aasha’s is a vibrant Couture and ready-to-wear fashion clothing house specializing in women and children’s wear. Designed in Hyderabad.

scripts.update: npm i @aashas/common@latest && npm run update --prefix server/auth && npm run update --prefix server/users && npm run update --prefix server/products && npm run update --prefix server/orders && npm run update --prefix server/designer
scripts.update:m: npm i @aashas/common@latest && npm run update --prefix server/auth && npm run update --prefix server/users && npm run update --prefix server/products && npm run update --prefix server/orders && npm run update --prefix server/designer  &&  git add .&& git commit -m " updated common module   "

author: tsriramaraju
